00024 // Function: ApplicationItem()
00025 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 ApplicationItem::ApplicationItem(QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00027                                  QString const& instanceName,
00028                                  QString const& displayName,
00029                                  QString const& description,
00030                                  QMap<QString, QString> const& configurableElementValues,
00031                                  QGraphicsItem *parent)
00032     : SWComponentItem(QRectF(-100, 0, 200, 40), component, instanceName, displayName,
00033                       description, configurableElementValues, parent), importedIcon_(0)
00034 {
00035     Q_ASSERT_X(component, "ApplicationItem constructor",
00036         "Null component-pointer given as parameter");
00037 
00038     updateComponent();
00039 }

00048 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 // Function: updateComponent()
00050 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 void ApplicationItem::updateComponent()
00052 {
00053     SWComponentItem::updateComponent();
00054 
00055     VLNV* vlnv = componentModel()->getVlnv();
00056 
00057     // Check whether the component is packaged (valid vlnv) or not.
00058     if (vlnv->isValid())
00059     {
00060         setBrush(QBrush(QColor(211, 236, 255)));
00061     }
00062     else
00063     {
00064         setBrush(QBrush(QColor(217, 217, 217)));
00065     }
00066 
00067     // Show an icon if this is an imported SW component.
00068     if (isImported())
00069     {
00070         if (importedIcon_ == 0)
00071         {
00072             importedIcon_ = new QGraphicsPixmapItem(QPixmap(":icons/graphics/imported.png"), this);
00073             importedIcon_->setToolTip(tr("Auto-synced"));
00074             importedIcon_->setPos(80, 6);
00075         }
00076     }
00077     else if (importedIcon_ != 0)
00078     {
00079         delete importedIcon_;
00080     }
00081 }
00082 
00083 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 // Function: mouseDoubleClickEvent()
00085 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00086 void ApplicationItem::contextMenuEvent(QGraphicsSceneContextMenuEvent* event)
00087 {
00088     QGraphicsItem::contextMenuEvent(event);
00089 
00090     QMenu menu;
00091     menu.addAction("Open Source...", this, SLOT(openSource()));
00092 
00093     menu.exec(event->screenPos());
00094     event->accept();
00095 }
00096 
00097 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 // Function: openSource()
00099 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00100 void ApplicationItem::openSource()
00101 {
00102     emit openSource(static_cast<ProgramEntityItem*>(parentItem()));
00103 }
